name: Bev and Micks International Backpackers
description:
Welcome to Bev and Mick’s @ McMahon’s Hotel – Your Social Home Away From Home in Melbourne!

We’re a fun, friendly, and international-only hostel, welcoming travellers aged 18 to 35 from all over the world. You must be travelling on a valid INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT to stay with us.

Whether you're backpacking solo or travelling with mates, we’ve got you covered with a variety of room options:

-Dorms with 4, 6, 8, or 10 beds
-Private double rooms for extra comfort

Each room comes with free bed linen, lockers, fans, and heaters. You'll also have access to our fully-equipped self-catered kitchen, a sunny terrace, and a relaxing garden.

Why Stay With Us?
-Free Wi-Fi
-Laundry just $3
-Cheap beers at the bar
-Free events like trivia, pool games, BBQs, pool competitions and gigs
-Free on-street parking
-Great social vibe and welcoming atmosphere

We're in a prime location too — just a 7-minute walk to North Melbourne Station and 6 minutes to the nearest tram stop on Errol Street, which is packed with cafés, restaurants, and shops.

Important Info:
Reception Hours: 10am – 11pm with Check in from 11am
(Late check-in possible if arranged in advance)

You must be over 18 to stay due to our licensed bar

E-bike and scooter batteries cannot be charged on the premises due to fire safety regulations

houseRules.notes:
We are an international youth hostel. We can only accept guests with a valid international passport and do not accept guests over the age of 35. Unfortunately we have no facilities for guests under the age of 18 years.

Our reception open @ 10 am and closes @ 11 pm. You maybe able to check in after this if not too late if pre-arranged well in advance.

Check out 10am 
Check in 11 am 

You must be over 18 years to stay with us as we have a bar on the premises.

Free on-street parking available.
